main-item.title: APPETIZER
main-item.description: THE FIRST COURSE OF A MEAL

appertizer-menu.title: Shrimp Cocktail
appertizer-menu.description: Seafood dish consisting of shelled, cooked prawns in a Marie Rose sauce,served in a glass.

appertizer-menu.title: Black Caviar
appertizer-menu.description: With cream cheese and dill. Also deliver a sweet, buttery flavor.

appertizer-menu.title: Tortilla
appertizer-menu.description: Italian twist with a creamy sundried tomato, pesto, and Parmesan filling.

appertizer-menu.title: Raw Zucchini Wraps
appertizer-menu.description: With turkey, cheese, and pesto all wrapped up in cucumber slices.

appertizer-menu.title: Deviled Eggs
appertizer-menu.description: Filled with a creamy filling made by combining the cooked yolks with mayonnaise, mustard.

appertizer-menu.title: Smoked Salmon
appertizer-menu.description: The classic combination of smoked salmon, dill, cucumber and cream cheese.

appertizer-menu.title: French Fries
appertizer-menu.description: Fries are often salted and served with ketchup, mayonnaise.

appertizer-menu.title: Fortune Cookies
appertizer-menu.description: A biscuit containing a message, usually about future.

kidmeal-menu.title: Pumpkin Soup
kidmeal-menu.description: Thick, creamy and full of flavour.

kidmeal-menu.title: Chicken Congee
kidmeal-menu.description: With just rice, water, and salt, this delicious rice porridge was made to stretch for days.

kidmeal-menu.title: Waffles
kidmeal-menu.description: Crispy and golden, perfect with strawberry or berries and whipped cream.

kidmeal-menu.title: Mac And Cheese
kidmeal-menu.description: Rich and creamy dish consisting of macaroni pasta mixed with a cheesy sauce.

kidmeal-menu.title: French Bread Pizza
kidmeal-menu.description: Topped with garlic butter, pizza sauce, oregano, and two kinds of cheese before baking to melty perfection.

kidmeal-menu.title: Steak Kebabs
kidmeal-menu.description: Beef meat that are grilled on skewers with vegetables and fruit.

kidmeal-menu.title: Omurice
kidmeal-menu.description: Savory chicken fried rice flavored with ketchup and wrapped in a soft, thin layer of egg.

kidmeal-menu.title: Chicken Soup
kidmeal-menu.description: The classic chicken soup consists of a clear chicken broth with vegetables.

veganfood-menu.title: Caesar Salad
veganfood-menu.description: Rich and creamy roasted garlic Caesar Dressing, fresh romaine, crispy chickpea croutons, almond parmesan, and avocado.

veganfood-menu.title: Summer Rolls
veganfood-menu.description: Packed with vegetables especially when served with a creamy peanut dipping sauce.

veganfood-menu.title: Avocado Cucumber Rolls
veganfood-menu.description: Cauliflower rice and mango are healthy, full of color and perfect for summer entertaining.

veganfood-menu.title: Butternut Squash Curry
veganfood-menu.description: Starts with a trio of aromatics, including onion, garlic, and ginger.

veganfood-menu.title: Matcha Cream Buns
veganfood-menu.description: Soft, fluffy buns filled with a light and rich matcha custard cream.

veganfood-menu.title: Szechuan tofu
veganfood-menu.description: A flavorful vegan stir-fry with crispy tofu, szechuan sauce.

veganfood-menu.title: Roasted Mushroom & Kale
veganfood-menu.description: Onions, meaty cremini mushrooms, and kale roast.

veganfood-menu.title: Bok Choy With Mushroom Souce
veganfood-menu.description: Smothered in a savoury mushroom sauce makes for a great meatless main.
